## WHAT WILL I LEARN?
### [Monte Carlo Tree Search](https://www.codingame.com/learn/MCTS), [Minimax](https://www.codingame.com/learn/minimax)
Algorithms such as Minimax, Alpha-beta, Negamax, Monte Carlo Tree-Search, etc.

External resources: [Wikipedia page about Ultimate Tic-Tac-toe](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ultimate_tic-tac-toe), [Introduction to Monte Carlo Tree-Search](https://jeffbradberry.com/posts/2015/09/intro-to-monte-carlo-tree-search/)

### STATEMENT
The first league is the classic Tic-Tac-Toe game, but starting from the bronze league, the game is played on a tic-tac-toe board where each square is a normal tic-tac-toe. The objective is to align 3 marks on the main tic-tac-toe board by winning on the smaller boards.

##[JOIN](https://www.codingame.com/ide/puzzle/defibrillators)
